title: 'We're going to always be grateful' - Chicagoans mourn loss of Jesse Jackson
summary_full: The BBC's Gary O'Donoghue spoke with city residents about what the civil rights leader's passing means for the community shaped by his activism.
summary_public: The BBC's Gary O'Donoghue spoke with city residents about what the civil rights leader's passing means for the community shaped by his activism.
